```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(etrm)
data("powfutures130513")
```

Inspect the powfutures130513 data
```{r}
powfutures130513
```

Create an instance of the MSFC class
```{r}
fwd.fut.npri <- msfc(tdate = as.Date("2013-05-13"),
                  include = powfutures130513$Include,
                  contract = powfutures130513$Contract,
                  sdate = powfutures130513$Start,
                  edate = powfutures130513$End,
                  f = powfutures130513$Closing,
                  prior = 0)
```

Available methods are "summary", "plot" and "show"
```{r}
summary(fwd.fut.npri)
```

```{r, fig.dim=c(7, 4)}
plot(fwd.fut.npri)
```

```{r}
head(show(fwd.fut.npri))
```
